general_info.summary: The provided text outlines an individual's rights concerning their personal information, including the ability to access, update, correct, or request deletion, with the caveat of certain legal obligations. Individuals are directed to contact the entity using the provided details to exercise these rights.
general_info.raw_content:
Your Choices and Rights
You have the right to access, update, or correct your personal information. You may also request that we delete your personal information, subject to certain legal obligations. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the details provided below.
